1.0.name: wordpress/flickrphotogallery
1.0.description:
FlickrPhotogallery allows you to insert one (or more) image gallery (retrieved from Flickr) into your posts using a shortcode; You can also use the built-in widget to insert the gallery into the sidebars.

The plugin allows to retrieve: * Public images * User-specific images * Photoset-specific images * Group images

It is also possible to choose to show the image gallery as an unordered list or as a slideshow, in this case you can select the dimension of it.
